column2: image=[[File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Ye Chequers Clubbe Binge.gif

column1: '''''Ye Chequers Clubbe Binge''''' is the title of a printed menu for a five course dinner, for the [[Chequers Clubbe]]. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] provided the cover artwork for the menu card. The menu was reprinted in ''[[Tolkien: Life and Legend]]''.<ref>{{webcite
